casebody.data:
FARRELL
v.
THOMAS 179A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, for Thomas, Kelly J. (Commissioner), et al. Richard W. Farrell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Farrell, Peter Jerard.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of May 2016 by Respondent to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
